title: The LORD Makes a Covenant with David
description:
Readings from:
2 Samuel 7:1-4, 8-9, 11b-16
Today's passages were read by Sarah Dahl, host of the podcast We Wonder.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
